lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: It sounds like a great way to go directly to the person who needs help to change the direction of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I repair peoples homes that have been damaged by wind, water or fire.

lender.name: Zeek
lender.loan_because: I've been in need many times in the past, and someone always seemed to step up and help me. It's my time to start reciprocating. Also because for every dollar I donate, more Slack wave/particles begin to amass in my general vicinity, allowing me to enjoy more Slack in return. Slack will get you through times of no money, but money won't get you out of times of no Slack. PRAISE DOBBS!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with a marketing software package. Fun at times, mundane at others.

lender.name: christie
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to make a decent living for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in a community clinic helping immigrants from many places, especially Latin America.

lender.name: Ana Yacubic
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women in business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wedding and portrait photographer in California.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make costumes for a performing arts company.

lender.name: Maira
lender.loan_because:
Mi marido y yo nos sentimos afortunados de tenernos el uno al otro y de estar trabajando bien, y queremos ayudar a todo aquel que podamos, queremos apoyar de alguna manera a aquellos que lo necesitan y dan muestras de querer progresar, somos fieles creyentes de que con trabajo y esfuerzo todo se puede alcanzar en la vida. Gracias KIVA!!
My husband and I are fortunate to have us at each other and to be working well, and we want to help everyone we can, somehow we want to support those who need it more, we are faithful believers that with effort and hard work you can reach everything in life. Thanks KIVA!!!

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by women worldwide who work so hard and have so little. I believe that women who are empowered and have a sense of community involvement can change the world, and I want to be a part of that goodness!

lender.name: Jmoney
lender.loan_because: I want others to feel the fulfillment of realizing their potential, providing for their families, and making a positive impact in their society.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm doing some good.
lender.occupational_info: Program computers

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I would like to see an end to violence against women and girls. I would like to see greater access to health care.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a diverse patient population- ranging from infants to adults, individual to community, well to terminal. I am passionate about women's health, public health and sexual assault forensics.

lender.name: Ramon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a difference in their lives and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer software.

lender.name: Nate
lender.occupation: I deliver sandwiches on my bicycle

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: We have so much in N. America. In fact, too much, and usually at the expense of the poor in other nations. Why not try to give somebody somewhere else a bit of a leg up on life and enterprise?

lender.name: Alf
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: KPFF Black Team
lender.occupational_info: We are engineers for buildings, bridges, towers, and other structures

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I find if fascinating that we can help others around the world with a few simple clicks of the mouse. There is no longer an excuse not to!

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard-working people work their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching English at a university.

lender.name: Inge
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I made some small money in a virtual small business. I could use it all to buy a game, or some trifle, but then it would be gone. I hope I can make an ongoing impact with it in some one's life. Giving to a charity would be great, but a singular gift. I hope to put this money to use over and over.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant for a Technology company. We make large systems for storing data, and our customers need help to install and run them. That is my job.

lender.name: Jean-Luc
lender.loan_because: why not...

lender.name: James H
lender.loan_because: I care for people who wants to work.
lender.occupational_info: teacher for words of truth

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I got my education through student loans, and without access to credit it never would have been possible. Whether it's for education or business, everyone should have the opportunity to make themselves a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in training to be a surgeon.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: i think its a wonderful way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grandmother and enjoy my family, my friends and my garden

lender.name: Susannah
lender.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to be empowered and succeed . I want to make a difference in someones life. I have been fortunate and want to help someone else feel fortunate. I have lived in third world countries and seen first hand peoples struggles to start and build a business so they can make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with holistic medicine, primarily acupuncture and nutrition. I help people restore their health so they can enjoy life again.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: - I can - I should - Josh and Chuck told me to - I want to
lender.occupational_info: I draw buildings on the computer.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I feel that I can Make an impact on someones life. I'm a student living in the US and without parents, friends, family and other resources that have lent me money I could not have gotten to the place I am today. Even though someone may look at me and say he is only a barista making a little amount of money, I know how lucky I am to have a means of loans and income. There has been many times in my life that I have asked myself, "come on world just give me one helping hand" and i would love to be that helping hand to someone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: Make coffee as fast as I can.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: To help little by little.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Initiative should always be rewarded!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I choose to, I want to, and I hope to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Primary School Children.

lender.name: Leland
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselve.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can and why wouldn' t you!?

lender.name: Nanda
lender.loan_because: Well, because I can ;o) This world belongs to all of us. So let's share it.
lender.occupational_info: There isn't much to tell about me.

lender.name: Marney
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in someone's life

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world in a way that encourages independence.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that helps run websites on the internet.

lender.name: OneStepCheckout
lender.loan_because: Just makes sense!

lender.name: BreZell
lender.loan_because: It is our desire to make our world a bit little fairer and to spread Gods love through finances.
lender.occupational_info: We are a postmodern churchplanting-project based on cellgroups in the center of Bremen, Germany.

lender.name: Leandro
lender.loan_because: Out of charity there isn't salvation.

lender.name: Shrikrishna
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of MNIT Jaipur doing B-Tech in IT Branch. I am also a writer write topics in any field that make my mind to think a little.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the unemployment office in my city to help people to find a job and generate their own income.

lender.name: Simon
lender.occupational_info: I design simple solutions to problems using simple mechanical concepts such as cams, helices, and friction.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and fix computer systems for a large transport company.

lender.name: Khalid
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs like myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a website consultant and I also manage my own website portfolio.

lender.name: Sveinung
lender.loan_because: I lived for two years in Tanzania in the 1970s, and left a bit of my heart there when I went back to Norway.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to me to enable people to work and make a living through their own efforts.
lender.occupational_info: Getting several different people to work together to bring products to market on time and meeting their commitments.

lender.name: TeenaMarie
lender.loan_because: I believe its good to help each other & trust. Believe in treating other as they should be treated or as I would want to be treated. You do someone a favor & you may need a favor from them one day. Its a good system if there's trust & commitment. The only way to change the world & help economy is to work together as a whole country, the world working together to make it a batter place for everyone, rich or poor full fill their dreams as they make a living. Makes life more enjoyable when you're not having to worry about how are you going to pay for you're next meal, how are you going to stay warm in winter when you're job laid you off, or how you going to pay for gas to even to get a job to pay your bills? The economy makes everyday life stressful & why can't we just enjoy our days more on this earth with the people we love rather than be worried about how we are going to eat. "I Believe In Helping Those Who Help Themselves or Ones That Are Not Able." Work As A Team & Succeed As A Team! :)
lender.occupational_info: Well, actually believe it or not, I am disabled, I collect retirement/social security. I spend alot of time at home because of this, so I have aquired a hobby/entrepreneur business within a virtual world online game. I design clothing, shoes, hair, skins & shapes for the characters in the game. SecondLife is a virtual world based off of real life but with ways to expand your dreams, fantasies, role playing, business dreams. Pretty much, anything you can do in reality in the world, you can do in SecondLife. Run a business(any business, build and sell your designs, own and run a dance club, become a Model, go skydiving, its endless. Its not just a game, but an enhancement to reality for a hobby or a real business that makes profits within the game, which you can, if you make enough in-world, transfer those funds to real money. So, yeah.. I think of my SecondLife Business as a Real Life Business. I am very passionate about it, love meeting different people from around the world, my friends I make there, I consider friends that would live near me. Its not about the profit really, its about the experience. Though, I haven't made enough money in-world to transfer to real money but I am having a blast. It also, believe it or not, SecondLife helps some of my disabilities, some times. I am hoping one day my business in-world will make me a profit in reality! :) Dream as if you'll live forever, Live as if you'll die today.

lender.name: Koos
lender.loan_because: I know how hard life can be in a country like Tanzania, as I have been there three times.

lender.name: Mr. Little's Class
lender.loan_because: Helping others is why we are here!
lender.occupational_info: We are a 4th and 5th grade class who wants to help.

lender.name: Timothy.
lender.occupational_info: Well am a student pilot now working for aberdeen air port and training at the same time.

lender.name: Joanie
lender.loan_because: I want more people in the world to become enpowered through financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I own an online gift shop. I had a brick and mortar store that was completely destroyed in a catastrophic flood. I could only afford to start a small online store.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because:
I am convinced that people can help each other directly.
No bank is needed for this activity.
lender.occupational_info:
I am retired but active.
My works:
a./ Am a president of a social association: We develop and fulfill systems for poor ( f.e.: workless) people to produce on self demand and sell the surplus on the market. So they can satisfy own demands and get occupation with production for sale.
b:/Work on"make money on the net" for supporting poor people
c./ Will restart my building activity ( i had more then 10 years a buliding company )
d./ Deal with the repatriation of my familiy properties.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer program users and makers to help make a product that will best benefit the user.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like helping people provide for themselves.

lender.name: High Meadows School
lender.loan_because: Voices of the students: We lend to KIVA because its basically making a small business wealthy and big for free. KIVA is a good organization because we are lending to people in need so they can provide for their families. It felt good helping someone who wanted to start their own business. We want to make the world a better place. Its just one person at a time, but it still helps. You already want to help people in poorer countries, and KIVA is a safe, effective way to loan them money. We wanted to help the entrepreneurs with stuff for their businesses and their families and health. Its like, if you were put in that position, you would want people to lend to you. We wanted to change someones life to make it better. We each have an opportunity to live a life. I think it really helps the world every time you loan. Sometimes we misuse money, and instead of misusing money, we could give it to someone who really needs it. It not only helps their family, but it helps the people they sell their products to. Thinking about the peoplehere at High Meadows, we have more money than the people there. We have things they would never dream of. They need shoes, shelter; we just keep on buying and buying. Because were environmentally friendly, we should be people-friendly, too. We made a ton of money to help through the fundraiser. We want to help people make money and feed their families. Were helping people in need. We already have everything that we need and we have money to afford the things well need later on. So why not use that money to help someone else. It feels good to lend. I think just one loan could helpchange a sad life into a happy life. We can help everyday people start a big business so that they can get the money that they need. KIVA is a safe website and good place to lend to. It can change peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: These students are in a multi-age 4th and 5th grade class at High Meadows School. They became interested in KIVA through their Environmental Studies teacher, Chris Robie, and with the help of their classroom teachers, Gary Denning and Jean Hunter, put on a Talent Show to raise money to lend.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want more women be in charge of their lives and their own financial security

lender.name: Joann
lender.loan_because: people who want to work and succeed and make a positive contribution to the world should be encouraged to do so!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students between the ages of 11-14 how to use computers and computer applications. My students live in an inner-city urban area on the East Coast of the United States.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an office worker.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do the same for me. It warms my heart. I love that I can share that same money when it comes back to me; it just keeps on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a healer... people call me with problems (health, relationships, finances, etc.) and we pray together for healing based on the healing principles given in the Bible. The website related below is not mine, but explains these healing ideas.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life to be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I help handicapped individuals to live a full and successful life.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Now is the time we all need to help each other
lender.occupational_info: I help people find good houses and not get cheated in the process, and I help people place advertisements in a magazine dedicated to increasing compassion and wisdom.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I care - and I've not seen a more practical way to alleviate poverty in the world.

lender.name: Wyatt Dog
lender.loan_because: I want to be the very best dog I can be and to help those around me. And I am helping my owners to make micro-loans to deserving entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Handsome, soft and smart yet stubborn and with tendencies towards snoring and flatulence.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Nothing is more satisfying than helping those who put out the effort to help themselves.

lender.name: Jack

lender.name: Kathy, Phyllis & Vivian
lender.loan_because: Micro Loans are Awesome

lender.name: Julien
lender.loan_because: Such a little amount here is worth a lot over there, socially, economically and environmentally !
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Computer Science at Universit of Bordeaux 1 in Bordeaux, France.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others so that they can have a robust life.
lender.occupational_info: I drive assist in managing trains in the Salt Lake City area. I sometimes have to drive the trains, but mostly I support those that drive trains every day.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all my good fortune and want to share with others.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world!

lender.name: Rusty
lender.loan_because: world peace needs active participation

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I symphatize with the problems you can run into the first years.
lender.occupational_info: Run a tea shop.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I feel very lucky to have a roof over my head, food on the table, and clean water to enjoy everyday. If a little money can help someone move closer to their goals and better life, then I'm grateful to be in a position to be a part of that.

lender.name: Netadder
lender.occupational_info: Online Advertiser

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: i'm developing new medical and medical research instruments

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: My family relied on microfinance from relatives when they came to Canada. I think the model works with people who have a deep care and respect for the money and how hard people have worked for it
lender.occupational_info: Help young people learn how to run small businesses

lender.name: jon
lender.loan_because: rn to bsn program . org is a large database of online and off link rn to bsn programs. rn to bsn program has a large data base of nursing scholarships and degrees

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get what they want or need through access to inexpensive credit.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: My family had a small business for many years. It's something I know about.

lender.name: Shea
lender.loan_because: It is my duty and love.
lender.occupational_info:
I take care of children while their parents are at work, helping them with school work. mostly fun and games.
One job is religious, the other secular. The religious job is to help kids with spirituality and helping others. We want to encourage service in everyone and a deep relationship with God.

lender.name: Spackle
lender.loan_because: My family has so much to be thankful for. Other than a belly rub and the occasional treat, I have everything I need.
lender.occupational_info: I give my family as much love and as many kisses as I can.

lender.name: Devetta
lender.loan_because: When a person wants to get out of poverty, but they lack the resources, I think it's only fair that the folks with the resources LEND a hand. Lending through Kiva is such a small thing, but it makes such a big impact when we all work together. So thanks for lending!
lender.occupational_info: Wetland scientist for the US Army Corps of Engineers

lender.name: gerard
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people of The Philippines

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and Kiva is a safe place to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer that shoots for advertising agencies, design firms, corporations and magazines. My specialty is people in their environment the combination of which helps me to tell a story.

lender.name: Coaching Today Ltd.
lender.loan_because: through this we can fight poverty. God blessed us to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: Coaching Today trains and coaches, among others, (starting) entrepreneurs. Furthermore we participate in development work

lender.occupational_info: I teach the Bible to young people in our church and at Christian schools in the area.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: we are one world.

lender.name: Dario
lender.loan_because: I know the impact a loan can have on someone who really needs it to get back on track.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Hotel Manager on passenger cruise ships and I meet people from all corners of the globe. I also freelance as a travel photographer when the time permits.
